title: The abridgment of Eusebius Pamphilius's ecclesiastical history in two parts ... whereunto is added a catalogue of the synods and councels which were after the days of the apostles : together with a hint of what was decreed in the same / by William Caton.
author: Eusebius, of Caesarea, Bishop of Caesarea, ca. 260-ca. 340.
